attributes.action: Don't leave the EU on the the 31st October.
attributes.additional_details: Over 2.3 million people couldn't have there say over the past 3 years! 16-18 year olds have not be able to vote over that past 3 years if they want brexit. When they grow up. They are going to have to fix this. So don't waste there time.
attributes.background: The desision was made in 2016, (3 years ago). This is a whole new generation now. Let are country vote if we want it. It's are country. About 66 million people have a say. Let them say it! It's are country after all.
